headline: Carrier Global price target raised to $85 from $82 at Goldman Sachs
summary: Goldman Sachs raised the firm’s price target on Carrier Global (CARR) to $85 from $82 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares following the company’s Investor Day presentation. The firm notes that the management’s medium-term outlook was in line with its expectations, implying $4 in EPS by 2027, while its focus on increasing parts and systems penetration was notable and should help spur margin accretive and more resilient growth, the analyst tells investors in a research note. headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks on Our Watchlist and 1 to Avoid
summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.
